archimate:Meaning.name: Data Owner
archimate:Meaning.documentation:
The business role responsible for ensuring all data under its control is complient with data management policies .
Expect data owner role to resolve to a single person or small group.
The data owner role may define data management standards or procedures to further refine the controls that should be applied to data under thier control.
The data owner shall be responsible for managing the data management standards and procedures that appy to business objects and enitities under thier control.
